name: Retroid (WizardDigital)
description:
Lead a small wing of space fighters in the battle to save Homeworld!

Retroid is a classic styled top-down space shooter with a few surprise elements. Only 4 levels long, every level is styled differently and each presents unique challenges and a different type of boss. You also don't fight entirely alone: as you advance in levels, you'll be joined by allied fighters and finally a destroyer as you battle your way back into Homeworld to drive out the invaders! Several varied power-ups will upgrade your weapons, increase your fire speed and load you up with missiles. The game begins fairly easy and quickly becomes...quite challenging! Good luck!

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys

Fire: Space

Missiles: Left Ctrl

Pause: Escape
